modulesToAdd.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals & Data Engineering
modulesToAdd.reason: Establishes a strong foundation in traditional machine learning concepts, essential data preparation techniques, and core Python libraries for data science, which are universally required.

modulesToAdd.title: Deep Learning with PyTorch & TensorFlow
modulesToAdd.reason: Covers the critical deep learning paradigms and the two most prominent frameworks (PyTorch and TensorFlow) consistently demanded in AI Engineer roles, including advanced concepts like embeddings.

modulesToAdd.title: AI Model Deployment & MLOps
modulesToAdd.reason: Addresses the crucial gap in deploying AI models from development to production, incorporating modern tools like Docker for containerization and FastAPI for API development, which are vital for real-world applications.

modulesToAdd.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) & LLM Applications
modulesToAdd.reason: Focuses on the highly trending and in-demand field of Natural Language Processing, including practical application with modern frameworks like Hugging Face and LangChain for Large Language Models.

modulesToAdd.title: Computer Vision with OpenCV
modulesToAdd.reason: Provides specialized knowledge and practical skills in computer vision, a significant and growing area of AI, utilizing the widely adopted OpenCV library.
